entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low zero.

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain except snow over northern sections in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
